attributes.additional_details:
Surbiton Hill Garage in The Avenue Surbiton is being threatened with closure..
Please sign this petition and stop this happening...
The garage was formed in 1964 and has been run for s long as i can remember by George Matkin ... I remember going there as a child with my aunty  to fill up her old renault car backin The early  80s
its one of the friendliest garages iv ever known   as well as the busy mechanical side of the business it is one of the only garages that will actually offer to fill yr car up FOR you which for some is a godsend.  whenever you go there  you are greeted by a friendly face and all the staff go out of their way  to help.
Please sign this petition to save yet another small business from disappearing and putting more people out of work.
Thank you
